subject: Greetings :
body:
Greetings : 
How are you doing today, I know this message is coming to you by surprise, I'm diplomatic Larry Rasford Phillips, working under  delivery unit,  , with your Consignment Box value in sum of $8.6 million dollars I was sent by the finance minister of American to deliver your compensation fund directly to you , 
please kindly reconfirm your details and also send me any form of identification, so I don't make a mistake in delivery,below are the list of details you are to send to me for confirmation.
Full name:
Current home address:
Sex:
Any form of identification that clearly shows your face
:
Your Age:
Occupation.
Please get back to me as soon as you get my text. THANKS.

subject: Re: Greetings :
body:
Hello Larry Rasford Phillips,

I hope this message finds you well. Thank you for reaching out to me. I must admit, your message did come as a surprise to me. I would appreciate it if you could provide me with more information about the purpose and details of this delivery.

Before I proceed, could you please clarify what exactly is in the box that you mentioned? Additionally, I would like to know how my contact information was obtained and why the finance minister of erican chose me specifically for this delivery.

Furthermore, I am curious about the reason behind requesting any form of identification that clearly shows my face. Could you please explain why this is necessary?

Thank you for your understanding and prompt response.

Best wishes,
Melinda
